Detailed Description

Reads the ASCII temperature data available at http://madis-data.noaa.gov/public/sfcdumpguest.html.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

00043         List<PointObservations.ObservationPoint> result = new ArrayList<PointObservations.ObservationPoint>();

00045         final int FACTOR = 10;
00046         final int MISSING = -99999 * FACTOR;

00049             String station = s.next();
00050             String date = s.next();
